messageText:
I'm sorry. I wouldn't even pretend I have had any affliations with Cashio at the moment of the attack. I come from a country domineered and trumpled by a dictator who wants blood and war, and nothing more. I need to flee out of here, to try go living some safer place, to save myself and my family. I thought, what if you can help me out. I need a lot of money to relocate, like thousands of dollars, and I'm desperate. But what if you can just help me out with whatever you think you could give away... I'm sorry for asking, but every day it gets worth. I have a feeling it will never be good again. 
I am a translator, a good one. I earned money just enough for living.
But Russian language becomes less popular nowadays. People hate us, and we hate ourselves for not being able to stop this.
I never chose a man who is driving this world insane.
I am scared, and I want to act, but it seems I can act only if I leave this country, otherwise I'll be fined and put in jail just like everyone else who was brave enough to oppose.
I need money to fight for the world and to save my family.
My current salary is $500 a month, and there is no way I can afford leaving on these terms...
I've been applying for jobs abroad, but since I'm a translator (and can't do much beyond that), I'm not really successful in these applications.

Thank you for your time, for reading this.

Just if you feel you are in position to help... My ETH address...
0x48786B7ddFE681beFC5315a75Eb26F96DcDa4a84

I hope it's the right one, I am new to Ethereum.
Please don't think bad of me. I amd seizing all opportunities I have...

Нет войне. Я за мир во всём мире. Я плачу каждый день, читая новости. Когда это всё закончится, когда мы отстроим разрушенные нами города, только тогда мир станет лучше.
